Notes (won't be used): Ratios are 0-1 percentages are 0-100%. Mark suggests to reverse the metric so higher numbers are generally better.
Green colored metrics currently available, black not (yet)
column8: Good values (green) are between Best Practice Min and Max (INCLUSIVE the min/max values)
Values below Minimum or above Maximum will be colored RED (if Min/Max are defined).
Values between Minimum and Best Practice Min or between Best Practice Max and Maximum become AMBER.
Use either Best Practice Min or Max (or both) to give the GOOD value (which becomes green)
Good values (Green) will not result in an issue code

We don’t have this per model category or overall, only by configuration
